# VEHICLE::SET_VEHICLE_TANK_STATIONARY

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **BOOL** stationary

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Makes the tank stay still when shooting at a target
